alert.note: Alert for Aroostook; Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 4:32PM EDT until August 13 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Piscataquis County in north central Maine... Central Aroostook County in northern Maine... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 432 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Big Machias Lake to 13 miles east of Churchill Dam to Tamway, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Portage, Ashland, Woodland, Portage Lake, Russel Crossing, Tamway, Churchill Dam, Big Machias Lake, Fish River Lake, Nashville Plantation, Chamberlain Lake, New Sweden, Perham, Wade, Westmanland, Garfield and Nashville. This includes State Highway 11 near Portage. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
